sentence.Network_en: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture.
sentence.Network_cn: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。

sentence.Network_en: Poor posture, sitting or walking slouched over, compresses the body's organs.
sentence.Network_cn: 坐着或者走路的时候低头垂肩，这种不正确的姿势会压迫体内的器官。

sentence.Network_en: If bad posture becomes habitual, you risk long-term effects.
sentence.Network_cn: 不良姿势一旦定型，日后可就有你受的了。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 和Luke一起看新闻扩大词汇量_英语杂谈_天涯论坛 ... pose，n， 姿势，装腔作势 posture，n， 姿势 positivism， 实证论，实证主义.
姿态_百度百科 ... [attitude;pose] 高姿态 [posture;carriage;gesture] 姿态 [appearance;shape] 高高矮矮的树木,姿态不一.
Sinograma  - Diccionario... ... 虎势[ robust;of blocky build] 架势[ posture;stance;manner] 就势[ making use of momentum].
雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... postscript 信件中附笔，附言 posture 姿势，姿态；态度 potent 有力的，有效的.

list.abs: ...髓对姿势的调节中枢神经系统可通过调节骨骼肌的紧张度或产生相应的运动，以保持或改正身体在空间的姿势，这种反射活动称为姿势反射(postural reflex)。在脊髓水平能完成的姿势反射有对侧伸肌反射、牵张反射、节间反射等。
postsynaptic potential 突触后电位postural reflex 姿态反射posture sense 姿势觉
姿势保持反射障碍(postural instability) ，呈现前倾姿势、细碎步行、加速步行等状态 ；平衡感差，病人常因缺乏平衡感而跌倒； 便秘…
微笑(smile) 开放的姿态(Open posture) 身体前倾(Forward lean) 身体接触(Touch) 眼神交流(Eye contact) 点头(Nod) 如果你目前仍然.
太极... ... 第二十四式收势 Closing Form 第一式起势（starting posture） Starting Posture 第二式右揽雀尾 Pulling Peacock’s Tail-Right Style.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting the relative position of one thing to another): from French, from Italian postura, from Latin positura 'position', from posit- 'placed', from the verb ponere

entry.def: Your posture is the position in which you stand or sit.

example.ex: You can make your stomach look flatter instantly by improving your posture...
example.tran: 通过采取更好的坐姿，你的腹部马上就会看起来平坦一些。

example.ex: Exercise, fresh air, and good posture are all helpful...
example.tran: 锻炼、新鲜空气和好的坐立姿势都很有益。

entry.def: A posture is an attitude that you have towards something.

example.ex: The military machine is ready to change its defensive posture to one prepared for action...
example.tran: 军方随时准备由防御立场转向备战立场。

example.ex: None of the banks changed their posture on the deal as a result of the inquiry.
example.tran: 没有一家银行因为这次调查而对该交易改变立场。

entry.tran: 故作姿态；装腔作势；装模作样
entry.def: You can say that someone is posturing when you disapprove of their behaviour because you think they are trying to give a particular impression in order to deceive people.

example.ex: She says the President may just be posturing.
example.tran: 她说总统也许只是在做样子而已。

means.word_mean: 1. position or arrangement of the body and its limbs;
2. characteristic way of bearing one's body;
4. capability in terms of personnel and materiel that affect the capacity to fight a war;

sentences.sentence: "we faced an army of great strength"

means.word_mean: 1. behave affectedly or unnaturally in order to impress others;

sentences.sentence: "Don't pay any attention to him--he is always posing to impress his peers!"
"She postured and made a total fool of herself"

means.word_mean: 2. assume a posture as for artistic purposes;

sentences.sentence: "We don't know the woman who posed for Leonardo so often"

auth_sentence.content: Besides just wearing a bad outfit with bad posture.
auth_sentence.res_content: Besides just wearing a bad outfit with bad posture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Besides just wearing a bad outfit with bad posture.

auth_sentence.content: There is not a gap in our flexible posture.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is not a gap in our flexible posture.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is not a gap in our flexible posture.

auth_sentence.content: But deference is an uneasy posture for journalists.
auth_sentence.res_content: But deference is an uneasy posture for journalists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But deference is an uneasy posture for journalists.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 作品,作文,乐曲;作曲;结构,组成,成分
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+pos放+ition表名词→放到一起→组合→作文
com一起+pos放+ure表名词→[精神]放到一起→镇静

stems_affixes.value_cn: 暴露, 揭露, 暴光
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出+pos放+ure表名词→放到外面→暴露
op对+pos放+ite表名词→n.相反的事物
pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度
sup在下面+pos放+ition表名词→放在下面的[想法]→推测

stems_affixes.value_cn: 令取某种姿势, 摆姿势, 作出姿态
stems_affixes.word_buile: pos放+ture状态→放的状态→姿势→态度

sentences.en: He bid us keep in a ready posture.
The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.
sentences.cn: 政府在独立这一问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。
她正在摆模特儿的姿势。

jushi.english: He bid us keep in a ready posture.
The government adopted an uncompromising posture on the issue of independence.
jushi.chinese: 政府在独立这一问题上采取了毫不妥协的态度。

jushi.english: The actress postured before the mirror.
jushi.chinese: 女演员在镜子前摆姿势。
